mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teamacomment (comment_id, content_id, userid, reg_date, content ) VALUES ( teama_comment.nextval, #{content_id}, #{userid}, sysdate, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, content_id, userid, reg_date, content FROM ( SELECT /*+index(teamacomment xpkteamacommnet */ rownum rn, comment_id, content_id, userid, reg_date, content FROM teamacomment WHERE content_id = #{content_id} AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
